PayrollSystem

Class MathHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • PayrollSystem.MathHelper

  • public final class MathHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents mathematical computational methods to be used within the Application.
    Email:
    jburges@csu.fullerton.edu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MathHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double getGrossPay(double regularPay, double overtimePay)
      Returns the addition of regularPay and overtimePay.
      static double getOvertimePay(double hoursWorked, double hourlyPay)
      Calculates overtimePay, time and a half, which is 0.0 if hoursWorked <= 40.0.
      static double getRegularPay(double hoursWorked, double hourlyPay)
      Calculates regularPay which is hoursWorked * hourlyPay but up to hoursWorked <= 40.0.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MathHelper

        public MathHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • getRegularPay

        public static double getRegularPay(double hoursWorked,
                                   double hourlyPay)
        Calculates regularPay which is hoursWorked * hourlyPay but up to hoursWorked <= 40.0. Values of hoursWorked > 40.0 return hourlyPay * 40.0
        Parameters:
        hoursWorked - amount of hours worked by an employee
        hourlyPay - hourly pay for an employee
        Returns:
        regularPay pay for hours worked less than or equal to 40.0

      • getOvertimePay

        public static double getOvertimePay(double hoursWorked,
                                    double hourlyPay)
        Calculates overtimePay, time and a half, which is 0.0 if hoursWorked <= 40.0. Otherwise calculates overtimePay as (hoursWorked - 40) * (1.5 * hourlyPay).
        Parameters:
        hoursWorked - amount of hours worked by an employee
        hourlyPay - hourly pay for an employee
        Returns:
        overtimePay pay for hours worked greater than 40.0

      • getGrossPay

        public static double getGrossPay(double regularPay,
                                 double overtimePay)
        Returns the addition of regularPay and overtimePay.
        Parameters:
        regularPay - pay for worked hours 40.0 and less
        overtimePay - pay for worked hours greater than 40.0 hours
        Returns:
        grossPay regularPay and overtimePay added
